Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
schedular.Controllers.LoginController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the Login Page. Here you will reach the login where you will enter your password as well as your username
